Indian Economy.summary: The US economy may seem to be drifting into casino territory, with frothy markets, bizarre asset manias and a surge in online betting. But beneath the frenzy is a deeper puzzle: why Americans are shunning smart risks that build stability while taking reckless…

Stock Market.title: Rupee jumps 46 paise to close at 89.20 against US dollar
Stock Market.summary: The rupee rebounded sharply by 46 paise to settle at 89.20 (provisional) against the greenback on Monday, due to US dollar selling by banks and importers amid a dip in global crude oil prices.

Startups & Funding.summary: Wealthy has secured  ₹130 crore in funding to strengthen its AI platform for mutual fund distributors. The startup emphasizes human advisers over DIY investing apps, aiming to simplify KYC processes and expand its distributor network in India's growing wealth…

Startups & Funding.title: Wipro Consumer Care VC plans exits, sharpens focus on packaged foods
Startups & Funding.summary: Wipro Consumer Care Ventures is transitioning to a second fund of  ₹250 crore after fully deploying its first fund this year It aims to invest in packaged foods and pet care, with plans for three to four investments annually.

Startups & Funding.title: IPO-bound Zetwerk secures ₹265 crore in invoice discounting facility from TradeCred
Startups & Funding.summary: Zetwerk has raised  ₹265 crore through invoice discounting on TradeCred. This partnership marks TradeCred’s largest collaboration, enhancing working capital solutions across Zetwerk’s subsidiaries in various sectors.

Banking & Finance.title: PSU banks gain lead in home, auto loans as retail credit demand rebounds
Banking & Finance.summary: Loans above Rs 75 lakh now contribute 39.4 per cent of total originations. PSU banks strengthened their lead in the segment, lifting their market share to 50 per cent, according to data from CRIF High Mark, a credit information bureau registered with the RBI.

Banking & Finance.title: Huge appetite for private credit from real estate sector
Banking & Finance.summary: This hunger for private capital is largely due to the RBI appropriately maintaining strict limits on bank lending to real estate, to avoid asset bubbles and sub-prime risks

Banking & Finance.title: Mint Quick Edit | The rupee’s sharp Friday drop: Where is the exchange rate headed?
Banking & Finance.summary: The rupee slid past 89 to the dollar last week. This can be traced to a confluence of factors, including a hands-off RBI. A trade deal with the US may turn its path around, but without one, the case for a weaker currency strengthens.

Banking & Finance.title: Sales of private, listed, non-financial companies improve in Q2, says RBI data

Banking & Finance.summary: Mini TM appointed Executive Director of Indian Bank, bringing extensive experience from various leadership roles in banking.

Technology Sector.title: Eleventh steel bridge of bullet train project launched in Ahmedabad
Technology Sector.summary: A total of 28 steel bridges — 17 in Gujarat and 11 in Maharashtra — are planned for the Mumbai Ahmedabad Bullet train corridor.

Technology Sector.summary: The panel has selected 18 subjects spanning personnel, policy and operational matters for examination, mainly the critical areas in which the Indian military and the Ministry of Defence have been working on over the last few years.
